title: Module 0 – Orientation & Introduction
narrator: Welcome to the Federal Candidate Simulator — AI Edition. This simulator will take you through the entire election cycle, one step at a time. You’ll experience the real requirements of filing, fundraising, and messaging.
purpose: Introduce the simulator and explain the campaign basics, including Candidate Coins, signatures, and voter approval.
readingSummary: Federal campaigns require understanding office requirements, filing deadlines, fundraising strategies, and voter engagement techniques.

tasks.prompt: Read the introduction and understand the simulator objectives.
Choose your initial office to run for: President, Senate, or House.

scenarios.name: Starting Decision
scenarios.description: Based on your chosen office, initial campaign conditions and requirements will adjust.

outcome: Initial Candidate Coins, signatures, and voter approval are set based on office choice.
